text: mthl fryqay alkufr wal'iiman kamathal al'aemaa aldhy la yaraa wal'asami aldhy la yusmae walbasir walsmye: ffryq alkufr la yubsir alhaqu fytbeh, wala yasmae daei allah fyhtdy bh, 'amaa fariq al'iiman faqad 'absar hijaj allah wsme daei allah fajabh, hal yastawi hdhan alfryqan? 'afala tetbrwn wttfkrwn?
